name: Optical
description: '''Matt Quinn,''' known by his stage name '''Optical''', is a British musician, producer and DJ. He is co-founder and owner of Virus Recordings, a widely regarded drum and bass record label. He is best known as one half of [[drum and bass]] duo '''Ed Rush and Optical''' (with his long-time musical partner [[Ed Rush]]), whose debut album ''[[Wormhole (album)|Wormhole]]'' has been described as pivotal in the development of the neurofunk subgenre. He is also the brother of Jamie Quinn also known as [[Matrix (musician)|Matrix]].
